entry.title: Day 23 - 2023-01-23 - Ocean
entry.content:
Linked hexes

  • Day 17 - 2023-01-17 - Coast
  • Day 22 - 2023-01-22 - Ocean

What's going on here?

The ocean. Some sailors say they saw weird creatures around here.

entry.title: Day 20 - 2023-01-20 - R'Gonteh
entry.content:
Linked hexes

  • Day 06 - 2023-01-06 - River & Lake
  • Day 07 - 2023-01-07 - Swamps
  • Day 19 - 2023-01-19 - Forest
  • Day 21 - 2023-01-21 - Desert

What's going on here?

The Old Town of R'Gonteh, made of strong wood and solid rocks. Its story goes back 2000 years in the past when the ancestors of the current inhabitants, the Ugons, travelled to find the Sacred Flame. Inhabitants believe the volcano they live on is their main "Old Spirit". The Brew Keeper is the main governor of the city. It has to be a chaman studiying the geothermy for all this life. Many try every ten year to become the new one. To do so, contestants need to succeed to bring some obsidian rock still warm (or at least they can make believe it is). R'Gonteh is one of the main nation in the region, it has a strong trade relationship with Ralakoï. Most of its citizen are trolls or orcs.

entry.title: Day 19 - 2023-01-19 - Forest
entry.content:
Linked hexes

  • Day 03 - 2023-01-03 - Inub, town in ruins
  • Day 05 - 2023-01-05 - Desert
  • Day 06 - 2023-01-06 - River & Lake
  • Day 16 - 2023-01-16 - Underground village
  • Day 20 - 2023-01-20 - R'Gonteh
  • Day 21 - 2023-01-21 - Desert

What's going on here?

Ruins stuck between a small forest and the desert. Weird wilds animals wait for their next preys...

entry.title: Day 6 - 2023-01-06 - River & Lake
entry.content:
Linked hexes

  • Day 1 - 2023-01-01 - Jungle
  • Day 2 - 2023-01-02 - Inhabited Mesa
  • Day 3 - 2023-01-03 - Inub, town in ruins
  • Day 7 - 2023-01-07 - Swamps

What's going on here?

The Tamanushi lake is a religious site for some animists praying a fish god hiding under the water. The cultists seems to follow the river as a pilgrimage. Most of them appear to be humans, elves or gnomes from different villages.

entry.title: Day 3 - 2023-01-03 - Inub, town in ruins
entry.content:
Linked hexes

  • Day 2 - 2023-01-02 - Inhabited Mesa
  • Day 4 - 2023-01-04 - Savana/plains
  • Day 5 - 2023-01-05 - Desert

What's going on here?

The Debulen family was always considered as scavengers or thieves. Their last stop was the old town of Inub. They found the ruins so peaceful and full of ancient treasures they chose to stay. Travellers were rarely happy to trade with the gnomes. The most probable reason was this rumor about the ghost of an old wizard haunting the streets at night. Or the fact that all the Debulens "wonders" seemed broken and useless...

entry.title: Day 2 - 2023-01-02 - Inhabited Mesa
entry.content:
Linked hexes

  • Day 1 - 2023-01-01 - Jungle
  • Day 3 - 2023-01-03 - Inub, town in ruins
  • Day 8 - 2023-01-08 - Ralakoï

What's going on here?

The camp overlooking the forest from the small mesa was no more than a dozen of wooden houses. It was one of this unaligned clan. The Guhrnogots were survivors with no chief. They were only following their faith in some wind spirits only heard by them. Most of the families were dwarfs and orcs. There were also trolls and even a minotaur! The youngest were joking about him being more dead than alive...

entry.title: Day 1 - 2023-01-01 - Jungle
entry.content:
Linked hexes

  • Day 2 - 2023-01-02 - Inhabited Mesa
  • Day 6 - 2023-01-06 - River & Lake
  • Day 7 - 2023-01-07 - Swamps
  • Day 8 - 2023-01-08 - Ralakoï
  • Day 10 - 2023-01-10 - Temple
  • Day 12 - 2023-01-12 - Plains

What's going on here?

A small refreshing part of the forest. Humidity seems tolerables but it seems to be the nest of insects and other rodents. A fairytale says an hag is coming sometimes to prepare her vile potions.
